original: atha yama smṛtiḥ //
analyzed: atha yama smṛtiḥ

original: śrī gaṇeśāya namaḥ //
analyzed: śrī gaṇeśāya namaḥ

original: atha prāyaścitta varṇanam
analyzed: atha prāyaścitta varṇanam

original: athāto hy asya dharmasya prāyaścittābhidhāyakam /
analyzed: atha atas hi asya dharmasya prāyaścitta abhidhāyakam

original: caturṇām api varṇānāṃ dharmaśāstraṃ pravartate // YS78v_1 //
analyzed: caturṇām api varṇānām dharma śāstram pravartate

original: jalāgnyudvandhanabhraṣṭāḥ prabrajyānaśanacyutāḥ /
analyzed: jala agni udvandhana bhraṣṭāḥ prabrajyā anaśana cyutāḥ

original: viṣaprapatanaprāya- śastraghātacyutāśca ye // YS78v_2 //
analyzed: śastra ghāta cyutāḥ ca ye

original: sarve te pratyavasitāḥ sarvalokavahiṣkṛtāḥ /
analyzed: sarve te pratyavasitāḥ sarva loka vahiṣkṛtāḥ

original: cāndrāyaṇena śuddhyanti taptakṛcchradvayena vā // YS78v_3 //
analyzed: cāndrāyaṇena śuddhi anti taptakṛcchra dvayena vā

original: ubhayāvasitāḥ pāpā ye 'grāmya śaraṇacyutāḥ /
analyzed: ubhaya avasitāḥ pāpāḥ ye śaraṇa cyutāḥ

original: indudvayena śuddhyanti dattvā dhenuṃ tathā vṛṣam // YS78v_4 //
analyzed: indu dvayena śuddhi anti dattvā dhenum tathā vṛṣam

original: gobrāhmaṇahanaṃ dagdhā mṛtam udvandhanena ca /
analyzed: go brāhmaṇa hanam dagdhā mṛtam udvandhanena ca

original: pāśaṃ tasyaiva chittvā tu taptakṛcchraṃ samācaret // YS78v_5 //
analyzed: pāśam tasya eva chittvā tu taptakṛcchram samācaret

original: kṛmibhir vraṇasaṃbhūtair makṣikāśvopaghātitaḥ /
analyzed: kṛmibhiḥ vraṇa saṃbhūtaiḥ makṣikā aśva upaghātitaḥ

original: kṛcchrārddhaṃ saṃprakurvīta śaktyā dadyāt tu dakṣiṇām // YS78v_6 //
analyzed: kṛcchrārddham saṃprakurvīta śaktyā dadyāt tu dakṣiṇām

original: brāhmaṇasya maladvāre pūyaśoṇita sambhave /
analyzed: brāhmaṇasya mala dvāre pūya śoṇita sambhave

original: kṛmibhuktabraṇe mauñjī- homena sa viśuddhyati // YS78v_7 //
analyzed: kṛmi bhukta braṇe mauñjī homena sa viśuddhi ati

original: yaḥ kṣatriyas tathā vaiśyaḥ śūdraścāpyanulomajaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ kṣatriyaḥ tathā vaiśyaḥ śūdraḥ ca api anuloma jaḥ

original: jñātvā bhuṅkte viśeṣeṇa carec cāndrāyaṇaṃ vratam // YS78v_8 //
analyzed: jñātvā bhuṅkte viśeṣeṇa caret cāndrāyaṇam vratam

original: kukkuṭāṇḍapramāṇan tu grāsañca parikalpayet /
analyzed: kukkuṭa aṇḍa pramāṇan tu grāsan ca parikalpayet

original: anyathāhāradoṣeṇa na sa tatra viśuddhyati // YS78v_9 //
analyzed: anyathā āhāra doṣeṇa na sa tatra viśuddhi ati

original: ekaikaṃ varddhayec chukle kṛṣṇapakṣe ca hrāsayet /
analyzed: ekaikam varddhayet śukle kṛṣṇapakṣe ca hrāsayet

original: amāvāsyāṃ na bhuñjīta eṣa cāndrāyaṇo vidhiḥ // YS78v_10 //
analyzed: amāvāsyām na bhuñjīta eṣa cāndrāyaṇaḥ vidhiḥ

original: surānyamadyapānena gomāṃsabhakṣaṇe kṛte /
analyzed: surā anya madya pānena go māṃsa bhakṣaṇe kṛte

original: taptakṛcchrañ cared vipras tat pāpas tu praṇaśyati // YS78v_11 //
analyzed: taptakṛcchram caret vipraḥ tat pāpaḥ tu praṇaśyati

original: prāyaścitte hy upakrānte kartā yadi vipadyate /
analyzed: prāyaścitte hi upakrānte kartā yadi vipadyate

original: pūtas tad ahar evāpi iha loke paratra ca // YS78v_12 //
analyzed: pūtaḥ tat ahar eva api iha loke paratra ca

original: yāvad ekaḥ pṛthak dravyaḥ prāyaścittena śuddhyati /
analyzed: yāvat ekaḥ pṛthak dravyaḥ prāyaścittena śuddhi ati

original: aparās te na ca spṛśyās te 'pi sarve vigarhitāḥ // YS78v_13 //
analyzed: aparāḥ te na ca spṛśyāḥ te sarve vigarhitāḥ

original: abhojyāś cāpratigrāhyā asaṃpāṭhyā vivāhinaḥ /
analyzed: abhojyāḥ ca a pratigrāhyāḥ a saṃpāṭhyāḥ vivāhinaḥ

original: pūyante 'nuvrate cīrṇe sarve te ṛkthabhāginaḥ // YS78v_14 //
analyzed: pūyante nuvrate cīrṇe sarve te ṛktha bhāginaḥ

original: ūnaikādaśavarṣasya pañcavarṣāt parasya ca /
analyzed: ūna ekādaśa varṣasya pañca varṣāt parasya ca

original: prāyaścittaṃ cared bhrātā pitā vānyo 'pi bāndhavaḥ // YS78v_15 //
analyzed: prāyaścittam caret bhrātā pitā vā anyaḥ pi bāndhavaḥ

original: ato bālatarasyāpi nāparādho na pātakam /
analyzed: atas bālatarasya api na aparādhaḥ na pātakam

original: rājadaṇḍo na tasyāsti prāyaścittaṃ na vidyate // YS78v_16 //
analyzed: rāja daṇḍaḥ na tasya asti prāyaścittam na vidyate

original: aśītīryasya varṣāṇi bālo vāpy ūnaṣoḍaśaḥ /
analyzed: aśīti iryasya varṣāṇi bālaḥ vā api ūna ṣoḍaśaḥ

original: prāyaścittārddham arhanti striyo rogiṇa eva ca // YS78v_17 //
analyzed: prāyaścitta arddham arhanti striyaḥ rogiṇaḥ eva ca

original: astaṃ gato yadā sūryaś cāṇḍālarajakastriyaḥ /
analyzed: astam gataḥ yadā sūryaḥ cāṇḍāla rajaka striyaḥ

original: saṃspṛṣṭās tu tadā kaiścit prāyaścittaṃ kathaṃ bhavet // YS78v_18 //
analyzed: saṃspṛṣṭāḥ tu tadā kaiścid prāyaścittam katham bhavet

original: jātarūpaṃ suvarṇañ ca divānītaṃ ca yaj jalam /
analyzed: jātarūpam suvarṇam ca divānītam ca yat jalam

original: tena snātvā ca pītvā ca sarve te śucayaḥ smṛtāḥ // YS78v_19 //
analyzed: tena snātvā ca pītvā ca sarve te śucayaḥ smṛtāḥ

original: dāsanāpitagopāla- kulamitrārdhasīriṇaḥ /
analyzed: dāsa nāpita gopāla kula mitra ardhasīriṇaḥ

original: ete śūdreṣu bhojyānnā yaś cātmanaṃ nivedayet // YS78v_20 //
analyzed: ete śūdreṣu bhojya annāḥ yaḥ ca ātmanam nivedayet

original: annaṃ śūdrasya bhojyaṃ vā ye bhuñjanty abudhā narāḥ /
analyzed: annam śūdrasya bhojyam vā ye bhuñjanti abudhāḥ narāḥ

original: prayaścittaṃ tathā prāptaṃ carec cāndrāyaṇaṃ vratam // YS78v_21 //
analyzed: prayaścittam tathā prāptam caret cāndrāyaṇam vratam

original: prāpte dvādaśame varṣe yaḥ kanyāṃ na prayacchati /
analyzed: prāpte dvādaśame varṣe yaḥ kanyām na prayacchati

original: māsi māsi rajas tasyāḥ pitā pibati śoṇitam // YS78v_22 //
analyzed: māsi māsi rajaḥ tasyāḥ pitā pibati śoṇitam

original: mātā caiva pitā caiva jyeṣṭho bhrātā tathaiva ca /
analyzed: mātā ca eva pitā ca eva jyeṣṭhaḥ bhrātā tathā eva ca

original: trayas te narakaṃ yānti dṛṣṭvā kanyāṃ rajasvalām // YS78v_23 //
analyzed: trayaḥ te narakam yānti dṛṣṭvā kanyām rajasvalām

original: yas tāṃ vivāhayet kanyāṃ brāhmaṇo madamohitaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ tām vivāhayet kanyām brāhmaṇaḥ mada mohitaḥ

original: asaṃbhāṣyo hy apāṅkteyaḥ sa vipro vṛṣalīpatiḥ // YS78v_24 //
analyzed: a saṃbhāṣyaḥ hi a pāṅkteyaḥ sa vipraḥ vṛṣalī patiḥ

original: vandhyā tu vṛṣalī jñeyā vṛṣalī tu mṛtaprajāḥ /
analyzed: vandhyā tu vṛṣalī jñeyā vṛṣalī tu mṛta prajāḥ

original: śūdrī tu vṛṣalī jñeyā kumārī tu rajasvalā // YS78v_25 //
analyzed: śūdrī tu vṛṣalī jñeyā kumārī tu rajasvalā

original: yat karoty ekarātreṇa vṛṣalīsevanād dvijaḥ /
analyzed: yat karoti eka rātreṇa vṛṣalī sevanāt dvijaḥ

original: tad bhaikṣabhug japen nityaṃ tribhir varṣair vyapohati // YS78v_26 //
analyzed: tat bhaikṣa bhuj japet nityam tribhiḥ varṣaiḥ vyapohati

original: svavṛṣaṃ yā parityajyāny avṛṣeṇa bṛhaspatiḥ /
analyzed: sva vṛṣam yā parityajyāni a vṛṣeṇa bṛhaspatiḥ

original: vṛṣalī sā tu vijñeyā na śūdrī vṛṣalī bhavet // YS78v_27 //
analyzed: vṛṣalī sā tu vijñeyā na śūdrī vṛṣalī bhavet

original: vṛṣalīphenapītasya niḥśvāsopahatasya ca /
analyzed: vṛṣalī phena pītasya niḥśvāsa upahatasya ca

original: tasyāñ caiva prasūtasya niṣkṛtir naiva vidyate // YS78v_28 //
analyzed: tasyām ca eva prasūtasya niṣkṛtiḥ na eva vidyate

original: śvitrakuṣṭhī tathā caiva kunakhī śyāvadantakaḥ /
analyzed: śvitra kuṣṭhī tathā ca eva kunakhī śyāva dantakaḥ

original: rogī hīnātiriktāṅgaḥ piśuno matsaras tathā // YS78v_29 //
analyzed: rogī hīna atirikta aṅgaḥ piśunaḥ matsaraḥ tathā

original: durbhago hi tathā ṣaṇḍaḥ pāṣaṇḍī vedanindakaḥ /
analyzed: durbhagaḥ hi tathā ṣaṇḍaḥ pāṣaṇḍī veda nindakaḥ

original: haitukaḥ śūdrayājī ca ayājyānāñ ca yājakaḥ // YS78v_30 //
analyzed: haitukaḥ śūdra yājī ca a yājyānām ca yājakaḥ

original: nityaṃ pratigrahe lubdho yācako viṣayātmakaḥ /
analyzed: nityam pratigrahe lubdhaḥ yācakaḥ viṣaya ātmakaḥ

original: śyāvadanto 'tha vaidyaś ca asadālāpakas tathā // YS78v_31 //
analyzed: vaidyaḥ ca asat ālāpakaḥ tathā

original: ete śrāddhe ca dāne ca varjanīyāḥ prayatnataḥ // YS78v_32//
analyzed: ete śrāddhe ca dāne ca varjanīyāḥ prayatnataḥ

original: tato devalakaś caiva bhṛtako vedavikrayī /
analyzed: tatas devalakaḥ ca eva bhṛtakaḥ veda vikrayī

original: ete varjyāḥ prayatnena etad bhāsvatir abravīt // YS78v_33 //
analyzed: ete varjyāḥ prayatnena etat bhāsvatiḥ abravīt

original: etān niyojayed yas tu havye kavye ca karmaṇi /
analyzed: etān niyojayet yaḥ tu havye kavye ca karmaṇi

original: nirāśāḥ pitaras tasya yānti devāmaharṣibhiḥ // YS78v_34 //
analyzed: nirāśāḥ pitaraḥ tasya yānti devā mahā ṛṣibhiḥ

original: agre māhiṣikaṃ dṛṣṭvā madhye tu vṛṣalīpatim /
analyzed: agre māhiṣikam dṛṣṭvā madhye tu vṛṣalī patim

original: ante vārdhuṣikaṃ dṛṣṭvā nirāśāḥ pitaro gatāḥ // YS78v_35 //
analyzed: ante vārdhuṣikam dṛṣṭvā nirāśāḥ pitaraḥ gatāḥ

original: mahiṣīty ucyate bhāryā yā caiva vyabhicāriṇī /
analyzed: mahiṣī iti ucyate bhāryā yā ca eva vyabhicāriṇī

original: tān doṣān kṣamate yas tu sa vai māhiṣikaḥ smṛtaḥ // YS78v_36 //
analyzed: tān doṣān kṣamate yaḥ tu sa vai māhiṣikaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: samārghan tu samuddhṛtya mahārghaṃ yah prayacchati /
analyzed: tu samuddhṛtya mahārgham prayacchati

original: sa vai vārdhuṣiko nāma brahmavādiṣu garhitaḥ // YS78v_37 //
analyzed: sa vai vārdhuṣikaḥ nāma brahma vādiṣu garhitaḥ

original: yāvad uṣṇaṃ bhavaty annaṃ yāvad bhuñjanti vāgyatāḥ /
analyzed: yāvat uṣṇam bhavati annam yāvat bhuñjanti vāgyatāḥ

original: aśnanti pitaras tāvad yāvan noktā havirguṇāḥ // YS78v_38 //
analyzed: aśnanti pitaraḥ tāvat yāvat na uktāḥ haviḥ guṇāḥ

original: havirguṇā na vaktavyāḥ pitaro yatra tarpitāḥ /
analyzed: haviḥ guṇāḥ na vaktavyāḥ pitaraḥ yatra tarpitāḥ

original: pitṛbhis tarpitaiḥ paścād vaktavyaṃ śobhanaṃ haviḥ // YS78v_39 //
analyzed: pitṛbhiḥ tarpitaiḥ paścāt vaktavyam śobhanam haviḥ

original: yāvato grasate grāsān havyakavyeṣu mantravit /
analyzed: yāvataḥ grasate grāsān havya kavyeṣu mantra vid

original: tāvato grasate piṇḍān śarīre brahmaṇaḥ pitā // YS78v_40 //
analyzed: tāvataḥ grasate piṇḍān śarīre brahmaṇaḥ pitā

original: ucchiṣṭocchiṣtasaṃspṛṣṭaḥ śunā śūdreṇa vā dvijaḥ /
analyzed: ucchiṣṭa ucchiṣta saṃspṛṣṭaḥ śunā śūdreṇa vā dvijaḥ

original: upoṣya rajamīm ekāṃ pañcagavyena śuddhyati // YS78v_41 //
analyzed: upoṣya rajamīm ekām pañcagavyena śuddhi ati

original: anucchiṣṭena saṃspṛṣṭe snānamātraṃ vidhīyate /
analyzed: an ucchiṣṭena saṃspṛṣṭe snāna mātram vidhīyate

original: tenaivocchiṣṭasaṃspṛṣṭaḥ prājāpatyaṃ samācaret // YS78v_42 //
analyzed: tena eva ucchiṣṭa saṃspṛṣṭaḥ prājāpatyam samācaret

original: yāvad viprā na pūjyante sambhojanahiraṇyakaiḥ /
analyzed: yāvat viprāḥ na pūjyante sambhojana hiraṇyakaiḥ

original: tāvac cīrṇavratasyāpi tat pāpaṃ na praṇaśyati // YS78v_43 //
analyzed: tāvat cīrṇa vratasya api tat pāpam na praṇaśyati

original: yad veṣṭitaṃ kākabalākacillair amedhyaliptaṃ tu bhavec charīram /
analyzed: yat veṣṭitam kāka balāka cillaiḥ amedhya liptam tu bhavet śarīram

original: gātre mukhe ca praviśec ca samyak snānena lepopahatasya śuddhiḥ // YS78v_44 //
analyzed: gātre mukhe ca praviśet ca samyak snānena lepa upahatasya śuddhiḥ

original: ūrdhvaṃ nābheḥ karau muktvā yad aṅgam upahanyate /
analyzed: ūrdhvam nābheḥ karau muktvā yat aṅgam upahanyate

original: ūrdhvaṃ snānam adhaḥ śaucaṃ tan mātreṇaiva śuddhyati // YS78v_45 //
analyzed: ūrdhvam snānam adhas śaucam tat mātreṇa eva śuddhi ati

original: abhakṣyāṇām apeyānām alehyānāñ ca bhakṣaṇe /
analyzed: abhakṣyāṇām apeyānām alehyānām ca bhakṣaṇe

original: reto mūtrapurīṣāṇāṃ prāyaścittaṃ kathaṃ bhavet // YS78v_46 //
analyzed: retaḥ mūtra purīṣāṇām prāyaścittam katham bhavet

original: padmoḍumbaravilvāś ca kuśāśvatthapalāśakāḥ /
analyzed: padma uḍumbara vilvāḥ ca kuśa aśvattha palāśakāḥ

original: eteṣām udakaṃ pītvā ṣaḍrātreṇaiva śuddhyati // YS78v_47 //
analyzed: eteṣām udakam pītvā ṣaṣ rātreṇa eva śuddhi ati

original: yaḥ pratyavasito vipraḥ pravrajyāgnir nirāpadi /
analyzed: yaḥ pratyavasitaḥ vipraḥ pravrajyā agniḥ nirāpadi

original: anāhitāgnir varteta gṛhitvañ ca cikīrṣati // YS78v_48 //
analyzed: anāhitāgniḥ varteta gṛhi tvam ca cikīrṣati

original: ācaret trīṇi kṛcchrāṇi carec cāndrāyaṇāni ca /
analyzed: ācaret trīṇi kṛcchrāṇi caret cāndrāyaṇāni ca

original: jātakarmādibhiḥ proktaiḥ punaḥ saṃskāram arhati // YS78v_49 //
analyzed: jātakarma ādibhiḥ proktaiḥ punar saṃskāram arhati

original: tūlikā upadhānāni puṣpaṃ raktāmbarāṇi ca /
analyzed: tūlikāḥ upadhānāni puṣpam rakta ambarāṇi ca

original: śoṣayitvā pratāpena prokṣayitvā śucir bhavet // YS78v_50 //
analyzed: śoṣayitvā pratāpena prokṣayitvā śuciḥ bhavet

original: deśaṃ kālaṃ tathātmānaṃ dravyaṃ dravyaprayojanam /
analyzed: deśam kālam tathā ātmānam dravyam dravya prayojanam

original: upapattim avasthāñ ca jñātvā dharmaṃ samācaret // YS78v_51 //
analyzed: upapattim avasthām ca jñātvā dharmam samācaret

original: rathy ākardamatoyāni nāvāyasa tṛṇāni ca /
analyzed: rathī tṛṇāni ca

original: mārutārkeṇa śuddhyanti pakveṣṭakacitāni ca // YS78v_52 //
analyzed: māruta arkeṇa śuddhyanti pakva iṣṭakā citāni ca

original: āture snānasamprāpte daśakṛtvo hy anāturaḥ /
analyzed: āture snāna samprāpte daśa kṛtvas hi anāturaḥ

original: snātvā snātvā spṛśet tan tu tataḥ śuddhyeta āturaḥ // YS78v_53 //
analyzed: snātvā snātvā spṛśet tan tu tatas śuddhyā itas āturaḥ

original: rajakaś carmakāraś ca naṭo vuruḍa eva ca /
analyzed: rajakaḥ carmakāraḥ ca naṭaḥ vuruḍaḥ eva ca

original: kaivartamedabhillāś ca saptaite cāntyajāḥ smṛtāḥ // YS78v_54 //
analyzed: kaivarta medabhillāḥ ca sapta ete ca antyajāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: eṣāṃ gatvā tu yoṣāṃ vai taptakṛcchraṃ samācaret // YS78v_55 //
analyzed: eṣām gatvā tu yoṣām vai taptakṛcchram samācaret

original: strīṇāṃ rajasvalānān tu spṛṣṭāspṛṣṭi yadā bhavet /
analyzed: strīṇām tu spṛṣṭa aspṛṣṭi yadā bhavet

original: prāyaścittaṃ kathaṃ tāsāṃ varṇe varṇe vidhīyate // YS78v_56 //
analyzed: prāyaścittam katham tāsām varṇe varṇe vidhīyate

original: spṛṣṭvā rajasvalāṃ yāntu sagotrāñ ca sabharttṛkām /
analyzed: spṛṣṭvā rajasvalām yāntu sagotrām ca sa bharttṛkām

original: kāmād akāmato vāpi snātvā kālena śuddhyati // YS78v_57 //
analyzed: kāmāt akāmataḥ vā api snātvā kālena śuddhi ati

original: spṛṣṭvā rajasvalānyonyaṃ brāhmaṇī śūdrajā tathā /
analyzed: spṛṣṭvā rajasvalā anyonyam brāhmaṇī śūdra jā tathā

original: kṛcchreṇa śudhyate pūrvā śūdrā pādena śudhyati // YS78v_58 //
analyzed: kṛcchreṇa śudhyate pūrvā śūdrā pādena śudhyati

original: spṛṣṭvā rajasvalānyonyaṃ kṣatriyā śūdrajā tathā /
analyzed: spṛṣṭvā rajasvalā anyonyam kṣatriyā śūdra jā tathā

original: pādahīnaṃ caret pūrvā pādārddhan tu tathottarā // YS78v_59 //
analyzed: pāda hīnam caret pūrvā tu tathā uttarā

original: spṛṣṭvā rajasvalānyonyaṃ vaiśyajā śūdrajā tathā /
analyzed: spṛṣṭvā rajasvalā anyonyam vaiśya jā śūdra jā tathā

original: kṛcchrapādaṃ caret pūrvā tadarddhan tu tathottarā // YS78v_60 //
analyzed: kṛcchra pādam caret pūrvā tad arddhan tu tathā uttarā

original: spṛṣṭā rajasvalā caiva śvājajambūkarāsabhaiḥ /
analyzed: spṛṣṭā rajasvalā ca eva śva aja jambūka rāsabhaiḥ

original: tāvat tiṣṭhet nirāhārā snātvā kālena śudhyati // YS78v_61 //
analyzed: tāvat tiṣṭhet nirāhārā snātvā kālena śudhyati

original: spṛṣṭvā rajasvalā kaiścit cāṇḍālair arajasvalā /
analyzed: spṛṣṭvā rajasvalā kaiścid cāṇḍālaiḥ a rajasvalā

original: prājāpatyena kṛcchreṇa prāṇāyāmaśatena ca // YS78v_62 //
analyzed: prājāpatyena kṛcchreṇa prāṇāyāma śatena ca

original: vipraḥ spṛṣṭo niśāyāñ ca udakyā patitena ca /
analyzed: vipraḥ spṛṣṭaḥ niśāyām ca udakyā patitena ca

original: divānītena toyena snāpayec cāgnisannidhau // YS78v_63 //
analyzed: divānītena toyena snāpayet ca agni sannidhau

original: divārka raśmisaṃspṛṣṭaṃ rātrau nakṣatraraśmibhiḥ /
analyzed: divā arka raśmi saṃspṛṣṭam rātrau nakṣatra raśmibhiḥ

original: sandhyobhayoś ca sandhyāyāḥ pavitraṃ sarvadā jalam // YS78v_64 //
analyzed: sandhyā ubhayoḥ ca sandhyāyāḥ pavitram sarvadā jalam

original: apaḥ karanakhaspṛṣṭāḥ pibed ācamane dvijaḥ /
analyzed: apaḥ kara nakha spṛṣṭāḥ pibet ācamane dvijaḥ

original: surāṃ pibati suvyaktaṃ yamasya vacanaṃ yathā // YS78v_65 //
analyzed: surām pibati su vyaktam yamasya vacanam yathā

original: svāta vāpyos tathā kūpe pāṣāṇaiḥ śastraghātanaiḥ /
analyzed: vāpyoḥ tathā kūpe pāṣāṇaiḥ śastra ghātanaiḥ

original: yaṣṭyā tu ghātane caiva mṛtpiṇḍe gokulena ca // YS78v_66 //
analyzed: yaṣṭyā tu ghātane ca eva mṛd piṇḍe go kulena ca

original: rodhane bandhane caiva sthāpite puṣkale tathā /
analyzed: rodhane bandhane ca eva sthāpite puṣkale tathā

original: kāṣṭhe vanaspatau rodha- saṅkaṭe rajjuvastrayoḥ // YS78v_67 //
analyzed: kāṣṭhe vanaspatau rodha saṅkaṭe rajju vastrayoḥ

original: etat te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ pramādasthānam uttamam /
analyzed: etat te kathitam sarvam pramāda sthānam uttamam

original: yatra yatra mṛtā gāvaḥ prāyaścittaṃ samācaret // YS78v_68 //
analyzed: yatra yatra mṛtāḥ gāvaḥ prāyaścittam samācaret

original: dāruṇā ghātane kṛcchraṃ pāṣāṇair dviguṇaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: dāruṇā ghātane kṛcchram pāṣāṇaiḥ dviguṇam bhavet

original: arddhakṛcchran tu khāte syāt pādakṛcchran tu pādape // YS78v_69 //
analyzed: arddha kṛcchran tu khāte syāt pāda kṛcchran tu pādape

original: śastraghāte trikṛcchrāṇi yaṣṭighāte dvayaṃ caret // YS78v_70//
analyzed: śastra ghāte trikṛcchrāṇi yaṣṭi ghāte dvayam caret

original: kṛcchreṇa vastraghāte 'pi goghnaś ceti viśuddhyati /
analyzed: kṛcchreṇa vastra ghāte go ghnaḥ ca iti viśuddhi ati

original: yo varttayati gomadhye nadīkāntāramantike // YS78v_71 //
analyzed: yaḥ varttayati go madhye nadī kāntāram antike

original: romāṇi prathame pāde dvitīye śmaśru vāpayet /
analyzed: romāṇi prathame pāde dvitīye śmaśru vāpayet

original: tṛtīye tu śikhā dhāryā caturthe saśikhaṃ vapet // YS78v_72 //
analyzed: tṛtīye tu śikhā dhāryā caturthe sa śikham vapet

original: na strīṇāṃ vapanaṃ kuryāt na ca sā gām anuvrajet /
analyzed: na strīṇām vapanam kuryāt na ca sā gām anuvrajet

original: na ca rātrau vased goṣṭhe na kuryād vaidikīṃ śrutim // YS78v_73 //
analyzed: na ca rātrau vaset goṣṭhe na kuryāt vaidikīm śrutim

original: sarvān keśān samuddhṛtya chedayed aṅgulidvayam /
analyzed: sarvān keśān samuddhṛtya chedayet aṅguli dvayam

original: evam eva tu nārīṇāṃ śiraso vapanaṃ smṛtam // YS78v_74 //
analyzed: evam eva tu nārīṇām śirasaḥ vapanam smṛtam

original: mṛtakena tu jātena ubhayoḥ sūtakaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: mṛtakena tu jātena ubhayoḥ sūtakam bhavet

original: pātakena tu liptena nāsya sūtakitā bhavet // YS78v_75 //
analyzed: pātakena tu liptena na asya sūtakitā bhavet

original: catvāri khalu karmāṇi sandhyākāle vivarjayet /
analyzed: catvāri khalu karmāṇi sandhyā kāle vivarjayet

original: āhāraṃ maithunaṃ nidrāṃ svādhyāyañ ca caturthakam // YS78v_76 //
analyzed: āhāram maithunam nidrām svādhyāyam ca caturthakam

original: āhārāj jāyate vyādhiḥ krūragarbhaś ca maithune /
analyzed: āhārāt jāyate vyādhiḥ krūra garbhaḥ ca maithune

original: nidrā śriyo nivarttante svādhyāye maraṇaṃ dhruvam // YS78v_77 //
analyzed: nidrā śriyaḥ nivarttante svādhyāye maraṇam dhruvam

original: ajñānāt tu dvijaśreṣṭha varṇānāṃ hitakāmyayā /
analyzed: ajñānāt tu dvijaśreṣṭha varṇānām hita kāmyayā

original: mayā proktam idaṃ śāstraṃ sāvadhāno 'vadhāraya // YS78v_78 //
analyzed: mayā proktam idam śāstram sa avadhānaḥ

original: iti yamaproktaṃ dharmaśāstraṃ samāptam //
analyzed: iti yama proktam dharma śāstram samāptam
